publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8017 David Whitton: Congratulations to East Dunbartonshire Fairtrade Steering Groupâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the East Dunbartonshire Fairtrade Steering Group on renewing its Fairtrade Zone status for the next two years; further congratulates the hard work done Sylvia Gray and all the members of the steering group, and notes that East Dunbartonshire now has 29 retail organisations, 24 educational establishments, 17 faith community premises, 14 catering organisations, three community organisations and seven workplaces where fairtrade products are available, including the constituency office of David Whitton MSP.
